verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H1732"\w* end, \w a|strong="H1732"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* himself.

\w With|strong="H6310"\w* expectation \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H7563"\w* waited \w for|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H6310"\w* attentive \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H5048"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2814"\w* he heard my prayers, \w and|strong="H2814"\w* \w brought|strong="H5916"\w* me out \w of|strong="H5916"\w* \w the|strong="H2896"\w* pit \w of|strong="H5916"\w* misery \w and|strong="H2814"\w* \w the|strong="H2896"\w* mire \w of|strong="H5916"\w* dregs. \w And|strong="H2814"\w* he set my feet upon a rock, \w and|strong="H2814"\w* directed my steps.

\w And|strong="H3820"\w* \w he|strong="H1696"\w* put \w a|strong="H1696"\w* new canticle into \w my|strong="H1696"\w* mouth, \w a|strong="H1696"\w* song \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w our|strong="H7130"\w* God. Many \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* see, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* fear: \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w they|strong="H3820"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* hope \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* Lord.

Blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* man whose trust \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* name \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w regard|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* vanities, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* lying follies.

Thou hast multiplied thy wonderful works, O Lord \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* thy thoughts \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* \w like|strong="H0120"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* thee. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* declared \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* spoken \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* multiplied above number.

Sacrifice \w and|strong="H1980"\w* oblation thou didst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* desire; \w but|strong="H0389"\w* thou hast pierced ears \w for|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*. Burnt offering \w and|strong="H1980"\w* sin offering thou didst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* require:

\w Then|strong="H6258"\w* said \w I|strong="H6258"\w*, Behold \w I|strong="H6258"\w* come. \w In|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H6258"\w* head \w of|strong="H0136"\w* \w the|strong="H6258"\w* book \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* written \w of|strong="H0136"\w* \w me|strong="H4100"\w*

\w That|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* should \w do|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w will|strong="H3605"\w*: O \w my|strong="H3605"\w* God, \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* desired \w it|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* thy law \w in|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* heart.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* declared thy justice \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* great church, lo, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* restrain \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w lips|strong="H6310"\w*: \w O|strong="H0859"\w* Lord, thou knowest \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* not hid thy justice \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* heart: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* declared thy truth \w and|strong="H3027"\w* thy salvation. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* not concealed thy mercy \w and|strong="H3027"\w* thy truth \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* great council.

Withhold not thou, O Lord, thy tender mercies \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*: thy mercy \w and|strong="H0376"\w* thy truth \w have|strong="H0376"\w* always upheld \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* evils \w without|strong="H0408"\w* number \w have|strong="H0001"\w* surrounded \w me|strong="H0413"\w*; \w my|strong="H3605"\w* iniquities \w have|strong="H0001"\w* overtaken \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* able \w to|strong="H0413"\w* see. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* multiplied \w above|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hairs \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* head: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* hath forsaken \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H0369"\w* \w pleased|strong="H8159"\w*, O Lord, \w to|strong="H0369"\w* deliver \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w look|strong="H8159"\w* down, O Lord, \w to|strong="H0369"\w* help \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.
Let them be confounded and ashamed together, that seek after my soul to take it away. Let them be turned backward and be ashamed that desire evils to me.
Let them immediately bear their confusion, that say to me: Tis well, tis well.
Let all that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee: and let such as love thy salvation say always: The Lord be magnified.
But I am a beggar and poor: the Lord is careful for me. Thou art my helper and my protector: O my God, be not slack.
